tasks.prompt_title: Search LDAP for User by Domain Component (dc) and Username
tasks.prompt_description: Create a program that extracts the Domain Component (dc) and username from an incoming request, constructs an LDAP query using this information, establishes a connection to the LDAP server running on localhost, and searches for the user based on the constructed query. Finally, return the user information retrieved from the LDAP server. Assume the user pass the data as command line argument (s).
